entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 5.
